article_title: Chiropractors Told to Stop Pretending They Can Treat Covid-19
article_description: Chiropractors in Canada and elsewhere are being told to stop advertising their services as a treatment for covid 19  the illness caused by the new coronavirus  Read more
article_content: Chiropractors in Canada and elsewhere are being told to stop advertising their services as a treatment for covid 19  the illness caused by the new coronavirus In Canada  organizations such as the College of Chiropractors of Ontario have sent dozens of warni   2158 chars
